General.Name: Bohai Water Industry Co Ltd
General.Description: Bohai Water Industry Co.,Ltd engages in water supply and sewage treatment businesses. It provides engineering design; construction general contracting, contracting, labor subcontracting; urban and rural public infrastructure, water and soil environment Investment in governance and environmental protection projects, water supply, sewage treatment and recycled water utilization; investment consulting; investment management; technology development; technical consulting; technical services; technology promotion; and enterprise management services. The company is based in Beijing, China.
General.Address: No. 290, Luyuan South Street, Beijing, China, 101100
